data.actual_result: App does nothing (but if you click the 'Continue to Discord' button in your browser, you DO actually the voice channel in the Web App).
data.expected_result: You App should connect you into the voice channel.
data.short_description: Inconsistent behavior when a non-members joins a server via a voice channel invite, vs when a member clicks the same link.
data.steps_to_repro: - 1: Create a instant invite link to a Voice Channel. - 2: Click that instant invite link (on either your own account OR on any user account that is a member of that server). - 3: Your browser will say 'Discord App Launched' and the button 'Continue to Discord'.
